Title: Ko-boldening
Description:
Bullies everywhere!

Innocent kobolds kept down by Candle King's thugs all across Warrens.

Give bullies taste of own medicine!

Once bullies beaten, innocent have chance to run. Be free!
ObjectivesText: Free oppressed kobolds in the Warrens by defeating their captors.
CompletionText: Now they will see what it feels like!
RewardText: Is start, friend. Is start. Thank you.
